meta.journey_title: From Normal to Beast — 60-Day Comeback Roadmap
meta.description: Complete seed data for LiveJourney app. Each day has tasks, knowledge checks, and XP values. Supports flexible_completion: can be marked complete 1 day early (pre-complete) or 1 day late (post-complete).

xp_system.note: post-completing a day (completing it late) gives 75% of normal XP as a penalty

pre_complete.description: Mark tomorrow's day as complete today. Full XP awarded. Day status shows PRE-COMPLETED.
pre_complete.unlock_condition: Today's day must be at least 50% complete (half tasks done)

post_complete.description: Mark yesterday's missed day as complete today. 75% XP penalty. Streak is NOT restored.
post_complete.unlock_condition: The missed day must be exactly 1 day in the past
